name: Quantum Suicide (itch)
description:
You wake up in a locked room with no clue how you got there. Your only company is the ships AI who tells you there is no way out. But you don't believe that do you?

Quantum Suicide is a short, proof of concept game with four different endings that I created in an effort to better learn RPG Maker in order to help with my main project In Your Dreams (Demo available).

This was made in three days and may be expanded upon in the future.
